meanings.sent1: She is very choosy when it comes to picking out clothes.
meanings.sent2: The choosy eater only likes to eat his favorite foods.
meanings.sent3: The choosy cat refused to eat any food that wasn't fresh.
meanings.sent4: Her choosy nature extended to selecting the perfect gift for her friend.
meanings.sent5: The choosy customer carefully examined each item before making a purchase.

meanings.definition: Showing a preference for certain options.
meanings.sent1: He is quite choosy about the type of music he listens to.
meanings.sent2: The choosy moviegoer only watches films with high ratings.
meanings.sent3: The choosy toddler insisted on wearing only one particular pair of shoes.
meanings.sent4: The choosy traveler always opts for window seats on flights.
meanings.sent5: Being choosy about his friends, he only surrounded himself with positive people.
